aws::graph::propositions: Amazon Payment Processing and Credit Card Program Risks
Amazon offers co-branded credit card programs.
Co-branded credit card programs could adversely affect Amazon's operating results if renewed on less favorable terms.
Co-branded credit card programs could adversely affect Amazon's operating results if terminated.
Amazon's business could be disrupted if companies providing payment services become unwilling to provide these services to Amazon.
Amazon's business could be disrupted if companies providing payment services become unable to provide these services to Amazon.
Amazon is subject to payment card association operating rules.
Payment card association operating rules include data security rules.
Payment card association operating rules include certification requirements.
Payment card association operating rules include rules governing electronic funds transfers.
Payment card association operating rules could change.
Payment card association operating rules could be reinterpreted to make it difficult for Amazon to comply.
Payment card association operating rules could be reinterpreted to make it impossible for Amazon to comply.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could result in Amazon being liable for card issuing banks' costs.
Failure to comply with payment card association requirements could result in Amazon being liable for card issuing banks' costs.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could subject Amazon to fines.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could subject Amazon to higher transaction fees.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could result in loss of Amazon's ability to accept credit card payments from customers.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could result in loss of Amazon's ability to accept debit card payments from customers.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could result in loss of Amazon's ability to process electronic funds transfers.
Failure to comply with payment card association rules could result in loss of Amazon's ability to facilitate other types of online payments.
Any breach of Amazon's data security systems could result in Amazon being liable for card issuing banks' costs.
Any compromise of Amazon's data security systems could result in Amazon being liable for card issuing banks' costs.
Failure to detect fraudulent activity involving Amazon's data security systems could result in Amazon being liable for card issuing banks' costs.
Failure to prevent fraudulent activity involving Amazon's data security systems could result in Amazon being liable for card issuing banks' costs.
Amazon's business could be adversely affected by payment processing issues.
Amazon's operating results could be adversely affected by payment processing issues.

complement.value: adverse effects on operating results from payment processing issues

text: In each case, it could disrupt our business if these companies become unwilling or unable to provide these services to us. We also offer co-branded credit card programs, which could adversely affect our operating results if renewed on less favorable terms or terminated. We are also subject to payment card association operating rules, including data security rules, certification requirements, and rules governing electronic funds transfers, which could change or be reinterpreted to make it difficult or impossible for us to comply. Failure to comply with these rules or requirements, as well as any breach, compromise, or failure to otherwise detect or prevent fraudulent activity involving our data security systems, could result in our being liable for card issuing banks costs, subject to fines and higher transaction fees, and loss of our ability to accept credit and debit card payments from our customers, process electronic funds transfers, or facilitate other types of online payments, and our business and operating results could be adversely affected.
